text:
Hi , Is there a way to perform this scenario in HubSpot

1. When the user will fill the HubSpot form like Registration Form.
2. User will get an email with some unique URl like we get it on any website registration to verified the user
3. once the user will click on that link from email user will be verified

Hello Raman Verma, yes we can achieve this by using automation with forms. You can also set up form submission notifications to receive an email when someone fills out a form. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/forms/form-automations>

How the unique URL will be created and will send to user ?
How  we can identify that right user has clicked the right link not the forwarded one ?
